document_data.name: Uthmere
document_data.mainbody: Formerly a port town, the walled village of '''Uthmere''' was left high and dry when the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] receded following the [[Spellplague]].  As of [[1479 DR]] the village functioned primarily as a trading post.

Notable locations.Temples & Shrines: [[Hall of Brilliant Justice]] • [[Hidden House of the Master's Shadow]]
